search.query: | pivot Application_Whitelisting Application_Whitelisting_Allow count(Application_Whitelisting_Allow) AS "Count of Application Whitelisting Allow" SPLITROW _time AS _time PERIOD auto SPLITCOL user SORT 10 _time ROWSUMMARY 0 COLSUMMARY 0 NUMCOLS 10 SHOWOTHER 0

| pivot Application_Whitelisting Application_Whitelisting_Block count(Application_Whitelisting_Block) AS "Count of Application Whitelisting Block" SPLITROW _time AS _time PERIOD auto SPLITCOL user SORT 100 _time ROWSUMMARY 0 COLSUMMARY 0 NUMCOLS 10 SHOWOTHER 1

| pivot Application_Whitelisting Application_Whitelisting_Audit count(Application_Whitelisting_Audit) AS "Count of Application Whitelisting Audit" SPLITROW _time AS _time PERIOD auto SPLITCOL user SORT 100 _time ROWSUMMARY 0 COLSUMMARY 0 NUMCOLS 10 SHOWOTHER 1

| datamodel Application_Whitelisting Application_Whitelisting_Block search | stats values(Application_Whitelisting.file_path) as "File Path" by Application_Whitelisting.user | rename Application_Whitelisting.user as User

| datamodel Application_Whitelisting Application_Whitelisting_Audit search | stats values(Application_Whitelisting.file_path) as "File Path" by Application_Whitelisting.user | rename Application_Whitelisting.user as User
